p: The colour plots in Supplementary Fig. 6c, e, g show the expected amplitude of torque, τ lever, as a function of field misalignment ( θ, ϕ) for p ≈0.11 at T = 180 K. Solid lines show the trajectories of the magnetic field in a plane with given misalignment. Supplementary Fig. 6d, f, h demonstrates the angular dependence of the magnetic torque, τ 2 ϕ ( ϕ), expected for the assumed misaligned planes of the magnetic field. For comparison, we also show τ 2 ϕ ( ϕ) when the magnetic field is exactly applied within the ab plane (black lines, θ 0 = 0 and ϕ 0 = 0).
